short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cover your Instagram feed, stories, or direct messages to reduce distractions and increase productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This product provides three toggle-able buttons that hide your feed, stories, or direct messages and keeps them hidden across tabs and upon reload
